product_name: Sugoi Shift Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When less is more but you still need coverage, the lightweight, flexible Sugoi Shift bike jacket for women helps keep you comfortable and ready to ride in almost any weather. Highly breathable, microporous polyester features swift moisture transfer-great for high-energy riding. Microfleece-lined collar has a classic stand-up neck band. Full-length front zipper with storm flap allows ventilation. Zippered back pocket easily stows gear and snacks. Elastic cuffs and hem help keep the Sugoi Shift bike jacket in place when riding. Semifitted cut follows body contours, preventing fabric from flapping in wind. Reflective details on sleeves, chest and back promote visibility. Closeout.
short_description: When less is more but you still need coverage, the lightweight, flexible Sugoi Shift bike jacket for women helps keep you comfortable and ready to ride in almost any weather.
